CustomField.formula:
IF( SBQQ__Quote__r.RecordType.Name = "Fundamental Quotes", IF( NOT(ISBLANK(SBQQ__Quote__r.Contract__c)), "Contract: " & SBQQ__Quote__r.Contract__c & " - ", "" ) & SBQQ__Quote__r.Name & " - Version: " & TEXT(SBQQ__Version__c),
IF( SBQQ__Quote__r.RecordType.Name = "Arbutus Quotes", SBQQ__Quote__r.Name & " - Version: " & TEXT(SBQQ__Version__c), "" ) )
CustomField.label: CustomName
